member.name: M:APITranslate.Implementation.TranslateService.FindByIsbn(System.String)
member.summary: Searches and returns the book identified by the specified ISBN.
member.param: The instance that represents the ISBN of the book to search for.
member.returns: An instance of the class representing the element with the specified ISBN, if found; otherwise, null.
member.exception: is an empty or white-space string.
